Create a virtual cookie jar: Develop an app that allows users to keep track of their cookie collection and provides suggestions for new recipes based on the ingredients they have on hand.
Cookie jar subscription service: Offer a monthly subscription service that delivers a selection of freshly baked cookies to customers' doorsteps.
Customizable cookie jar: Create a cookie jar that can be personalized with a customer's name or initials, making it a unique and thoughtful gift.
Cookie jar with smart technology: Develop a cookie jar that uses smart technology to keep track of the number of cookies inside and alerts users when it's time to bake more.
Cookie jar with a twist: Create a cookie jar that the when it's time to bake a new batch of cookies, making it easy for users to keep track of their progress and never miss a step.
